entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 early this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
